mapper.sql: id, name, description, enable, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT t5.id AS id, t5.pid AS pid, t5.name AS name, t5.value AS value, t5.icon AS icon, t5.type AS type, t5.uri AS uri FROM ums_admin AS t1 LEFT JOIN ums_admin_role_relation AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.admin_id LEFT JOIN ums_role AS t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_permission_relation AS t4 ON t3.id = t4.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_permission AS t5 ON t4.permission_id = t5.id WHERE t1.username = #{username};
